text: Robert Reynolds Cushing (July 20, 1952 â€“ March 7, 2022) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the New Hampshire House of Representatives from 1986 until 1988, 1996 until 1998, 2008 until 2010 and from 2012 until his death. Cushing was born in Portsmouth, New Hampshire. In 2020, Cushing was diagnosed with stage four prostate cancer. He died from the disease in Hampton, New Hampshire on March 7, 2022 at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Members of the New Hampshire General Court Category:Politicians from New Hampshire Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Cancer deaths in New Hampshire
title: Renny Cushing
